messages.messageBody:
This is the kozuka Curran is referring to

http://www4.ocn.ne.jp/~y-kimura/10-126.htm

I am at work and have nothing here to help.

Rich
>
>
> Please see the kozuka in this link:
> http://www4.ocn.ne.jp/~y-kimura/10.htm
> <http://www4.ocn.ne.jp/%7Ey-kimura/10.htm>
>
> It is attributed to: "ü"Z OEõ'PZ(>

> Or can it be read as: (Mino) Mitsuyoshi-ji ?

> anyone share about this attribution/school?
>
> Sincerely,

anyone share about this attribution/school?
